author: dougm
msg: "thread item pool" - generic logic broken out from modperl_interp.c so it can be reused for other things, e.g. database connection handles

author: dougm
msg: handler caching is broken, fix later

author: dougm
msg: split interpreter list into two lists, busy and idle
this cuts out search time for selecting/unselecting
and keeps used idle interpreters at the head of the list so Perl memory
allocations are re-used as much as possible

author: dougm
msg: "discover" xs modules.  since there is no list hardwired
any module can be unpacked in the mod_perl-2.xx directory
this stunt also make it possible to leave .xs files where
they are, unlike 1.xx where *.xs live in src/modules/perl
and are copied to subdir/ if DYNAMIC=1
